disp-quote.p: “ As for me, my brothers, mother, everyone, all my siblings staying here–there is no one who does not know that I am taking PrEP! So you find for me it’s easy to keep my bottle in the open and not stashing it in my bag where I can forget it for sure. […] That helps a lot. ”–Female, 23, two partners, HIV status unknown (URB09) (AM)
